There are two ways to configure the support for an eXist database:
Use the dedicated Create eXist-db XML connection wizard.
, go to Data Sources and click the Create eXist-db XML connection link.
Enter your connection details in the connection wizard and click OK.To create an eXist connection using this wizard, expects the exist/webstart/exist.jnlp path to be accessible at the provided Host and Port.
To view your connection, go to the Data Source Explorer view or switch to the Database perspective.
Use the Data Sources preferences page to configure your connection.
Configure eXist Data Source drivers.
Configure an eXist Connection.
To view your connection, go to the Data Source Explorer view or switch to the Database perspective.
